entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
